channel.title: CVE Feed for digitalbazaar -- zcap
channel.description: The latest CVEs for digitalbazaar -- zcap

item.title: CVE-2024-31995|2024-04-10T21:57:41.129Z -- digitalbazaar -- zcap
item.description: `@digitalbazaar/zcap` provides JavaScript reference implementation for Authorization Capabilities. Prior to version 9.0.1, when invoking a capability with a chain depth of 2, i.e., it is delegated directly from the root capability, the `expires` property is not properly checked against the current date or other `date` param. This can allow invocations outside of the original intended time period. A zcap still cannot be invoked without being able to use the associated private key material. `@digitalbazaar/zcap` v9.0.1 fixes expiration checking. As a workaround, one may revoke a zcap at any time.
